metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6280 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
NVIDIA driver contains a possible out-of-bounds read vulnerability due to a leak which may lead to information disclosure. This issue is rated as moderate. Android: A-63851980. sbeattie> drivers/gpu/drm/nouveau/nvkm/core/ioctl.c::nvkm_ioctl() sbeattie> possibly fixed in bf81df9be28657eea4aca8c6ab4ed3e69f8a051c

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
